metadata.synopsis: Played after being told by Sazza about Gut.Speaker 1 is the character who left the dialog. Neutral inquisitive remark about whether the rumoured healer could really help.Speaker 2 is any other party member. Line can be opinionated.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: A goblin healer? That's a new one. But she might be the only way to keep our skulls intact.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: She's worth talking to, at least.
